div.head: Description of changes for 2012.07
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. It awaits corrections and additions pending a collation comparison of the available manuscript witnesses. Some cross-references have already been added. Other citations, footnotes, and a critical apparatus await construction.
